original_text: But even if they do have children, I will cause them all to die so that none are still alive. It will be a terrible time for the Israelites, because I will turn away from them. But even if they do have children, I will cause them all to die so that none are still alive. It will be a terrible time for the Israelites, because I will turn away from them. But even if they do have children,
korean_text: 혹 그들이 자식을 기를지라도 내가 그 자식을 없이하여 한 사람도 남기지 아니할 것이라 내가 그들을 떠나는 때에는 그들에게 화가 미치리로다

sentences.original_text: But even if they do have children
I will cause them all to die
so that none are still alive
It will be a terrible time
because I will turn away from them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게서 등을 돌릴 것이기 때문이다
